subject: Re: [junit] junit for with ant 1.6
msgSnippet: Saju, This is really late, but might help people searching the archives.  I believe that ant did not fully support JUnit 4 until version 1.7.  If anyone knows
messageBody:
Saju,

This is really late, but might help people searching the archives. I
believe that ant did not fully support JUnit 4 until version 1.7. If
anyone knows differently, please let me know. Thanks,

David

On Tue, Feb 19, 2008 at 1:52 PM, Saju Madhavan <halex52@...> wrote:
> Hello
>
> Has any one come across an issue when trying to run junit4 tests using
> ant 1.6. Any help would be greally appreciated.
> thanks
> Honey Alex
>
> junit.framework.JUnit4TestCaseFacade(unknown) Error No tests found in
> Mytest
>
> junit.framework.AssertionFailedError: No tests found in Mytest
> at
> org.junit.internal.runners.OldTestClassRunner.run(OldTestClassRunner.java:35)
> at junit.framework.JUnit4TestAdapter.run(JUnit4TestAdapter.java:32)
>
>
>
>
> Yahoo! Groups Links
>
>
>
>
